DOC.brief_summary: Cardiac catheterization traditionally perform via access arterial circulation femoral artery locate groin . As alternative approach , radial artery , locate arm , gain wider use clinical practice . Multiple study demonstrate cardiac catheterization via radial approach low complication rate , short term . This study intend determine difference long term complication rate radial artery cardiac catheterization compare femoral artery cardiac catheterization .
DOC.brief_title: Radial Versus Femoral Arterial Access Cardiac Catheterization : Comparison Complications 30 Days
DOC.criteria: Male Female 19 year old old candidate radial femoral cardiac catheterization
